name: Grave Mistake (mcbloch, Murly, abeforitch, Dexagod, werthen)
name_original: Grave Mistake (mcbloch, Murly, abeforitch, Dexagod, werthen)
description:
Gravy the gravedigger was picked by Death himself to give monsters their final resting place.

Death however, isn't a very considerate boss and keeps flooding poor Gravy with fresh corpses. Help Gravy complete his task and dig your way down to hell...

A submission for the Ludum Dare 48.
